Configuration.StudyNameEntrez: University of Washington Center for Mendelian Genomics (UW-CMG)
Configuration.StudyNameReportPage: University of Washington Center for Mendelian Genomics (UW-CMG)
Configuration.Description: The Centers for Mendelian Genomics project uses next-generation sequencing and computational approaches to discover the genes and variants that underlie Mendelian conditions. By discovering genes that cause Mendelian conditions, we will expand our understanding of their biology to facilitate diagnosis and new treatments.

Configuration.StudyHistory:
Study version 1 release made available data of n=10 subjects.

Study version 2 release made available data of n=79 subjects.

Study version 3 release made available data of n=610 subjects.

Study version 4 release makes available data of n=928 subjects.

ParticipantSet.UseLimitation: Use of the data is limited only by the terms of the model Data Use Certification.
